title: Boys will be boys (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions, Equal Opportunity Resource Unit, John Dovey and Roger Selleck
brief_description: Examines the attitudes of teenage boys to teenage girls, their peers and their parents. Three segments are dramatised and then discussed by the participants highlighting the conflicts and dynamics of each situation.
creator_credit_for_label: Open Channel Productions, Equal Opportunity Resource Unit, John Dovey and Roger Selleck
